Name: Berry Madness
About the game: About Berry Madness is a casual walking simulator game where you need to find all of the berries to win the game and claim your champion of the berries. You can find berries in different locatioins and listen to awesome music. story You spawn in a new beatiful world and your mission is to hunt all the berries and become a champion berry hunter. Features Jumping Controls: W=FORWARD A=LEFT S=BACKWARDS D=RIGHT SPACE=JUMP
